entry.title: WIND WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:59 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: E 49 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
